mapper.insert: insert into orderform (user_id, phone, number, express, addresser, addressee, merchandise, shopping_address, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{express,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addresser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchandise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoppingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update orderform set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express = #{express,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addresser = #{addresser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addressee = #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchandise = #{merchandise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopping_address = #{shoppingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, phone, number, express, addresser, addressee, merchandise, shopping_address, create_time, update_time from orderform where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_id, phone, number, express, addresser, addressee, merchandise, shopping_address, create_time, update_time from orderform
